oai_dc:dc.dc:title: COMPUTATION OF COMBINED REFRACTION - DIFFRACTION
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Berkhoff, J.C.W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diffraction
refraction
wave computation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper treats the derivation of a two-dimensional differential equation, which describes the phenomenon of combined refraction - diffraction for simple harmonic waves, and a method of solving this equation. The equation is derived with the aid of a small parameter development, and the method of solution is based on the finite element technique, together with a source distribution method.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 13 (1972): Proceedings of 13th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Vancouver, Canada, 1972.; 23
